<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.ChangePolicyApprovalActivity</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>The script in the Change Approval Policy activity refers to this Script Include.  To modify behavior, use this Script Include to override functions defined in the ChangePolicyApprovalActivitySNC Script Include.</description> <name>ChangePolicyApprovalActivity</name> <script><![CDATA[var ChangePolicyApprovalActivity = Class.create(); ChangePolicyApprovalActivity.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.ChangePolicyApprovalActivitySNC, {
initialize: function(_gr, _gs, _activity, _context, _workflow) { global.ChangePolicyApprovalActivitySNC.prototype.initialize.call(this, _gr, _gs, _activity, _context, _workflow); },
type: 'ChangePolicyApprovalActivity' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-10-25 10:10:45</sys_created_on> <sys_id>8473fbe6535123008ef67c2c0fc58714</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ChangePolicyApprovalActivity</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Change Management - Change Policy Core Components" source="com.snc.change_management.policy">48b409cf6da620100acb70b353433042</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8473fbe6535123008ef67c2c0fc58714</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-10-25 10:10:55</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>393</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
